title: Windows Systems Restarting, Throwing Blue Screen Of Death Due To This Error
content: Millions of Windows users across the globe are experiencing the Blue Screen of Death (BSOD) error which is causing the system to suddenly shut down or restart.
summary: Millions of Windows users across the globe are experiencing the Blue Screen of Death (BSOD) error which is causing the system to suddenly shut down or restart.

title: Trump Shooter's Father Called Cops About Missing Gun Before Attack: Report
content: Before Thomas Matthew Crooks aimed his AR-15 gun at Former US President Donald Trump during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania, his father contacted the police, concerned about his son's location when a gun was missing from their home.
summary: Before Thomas Matthew Crooks aimed his AR-15 gun at Former US President Donald Trump during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania, his father contacted the police, concerned about his son's location when a gun was missing from their home.

title: "Aerial Explosion" Near US Embassy In Tel Aviv Kills 1, Injures 2
content: An explosion in Tel Aviv early Friday left one person dead, an Israeli emergency services spokesperson told AFP, with the army saying a falling "aerial target" caused the blast.

title: Google Brings AI To US Broadcast Of Paris Olympics
content: Google will be named the official search AI partner of Team USA, marking the first time a tech company has partnered with a sports nonprofit.

title: Donald Trump Accepts Republican Nomination Amid Chants Of USA From Crowd
content: Donald Trump predicted an "incredible victory" Thursday in accepting the Republican presidential nomination from a party euphoric over his escape from assassination and buoyed by the apparent implosion of Joe Biden's reelection campaign.
summary: Donald Trump predicted an "incredible victory" Thursday in accepting the Republican presidential nomination from a party euphoric over his escape from assassination and buoyed by the apparent implosion of Joe Biden's reelection campaign.

content: A major magnitude 7.4 earthquake struck northern Chile on Thursday, the United States Geological Survey said.

title: "Must Not Criminalise Dissent": Trump Slams "Witch-Hunt" By Democrats

title: Journalist Fined Rs 4.5 Lakh For Posting A Joke On Giorgia Meloni's Height
content: A Milan court has ordered a journalist to pay Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni damages of 5000 euros for making fun of her in a social media post, news agency ANSA and other local media reported.
summary: A Milan court has ordered a journalist to pay Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni damages of 5000 euros for making fun of her in a social media post, news agency ANSA and other local media reported.

title: Biden Nears Crunch Point As Pressure Grows To Drop Out Of White House Race
content: US President Joe Biden was reportedly coming closer to dropping out of the White House race Friday as allies including Barack Obama were said to have expressed concerns that he can no longer win the 2024 election.
summary: US President Joe Biden was reportedly coming closer to dropping out of the White House race Friday as allies including Barack Obama were said to have expressed concerns that he can no longer win the 2024 election.
